value:
My interest in Askr goes without
saying, but any world that houses
Heroes is also worth further inquiry.

To conduct my research, I took to
living in the forest, alone. But lonely?
Never. It was nice, actually... Quiet.

Allow me the opportunity to apply
some seiðjarn to aid you...

Your weapon is a miracle only one
of the great dragons could produce...
Do you mind if I take a closer look?

What secrets does the summoning
shrine hide within? I hope to unlock
its secrets, but...no success thus far.

Would you like me to improve your
Heroes for you? You need not worry
over the results...

The occasion of growing stronger
is something to be savored. I get
the opportunity so rarely.
Adequate.

The nature of experimentation,
I'm afraid.

A new power... Nothing could make
me happier. Conducting tests on my
own body is very convenient.

I am Eitri, a humble scholar. To be
the Hero summoned is...exhilarating.

Something's been troubling me.
The number of kind people here
is higher than I expected.$k$pBecause of the way I look in this
form, people seem to think I will
have interest in candy or play...$k$pI only want to conduct my research
in peace...$k$pI made a manakete girl cry by using
a device to make myself disappear
during hide and seek... Tiresome.$k$pBut being able to study manakete
behavior up close is something I
relish, so I put up with it...some.$k$pMaybe you'd care to join us next
time? I won't need to take it easy
on YOU, will I? Heh heh...
はっ
I wonder what effect this will have?
うっ…
A failure...
How about…
Let's try…THIS!
How thoughtless.
You shouldn't get in my way.
What a pain...
Hehe...
I am Eitri, a humble scholar. There are those who call me a sage, but, well...
Hmm? Oh, sorry. Were you trying to surprise me?
Family? Friends? I do not have them. I do not need them.
So these are the Heroes produced by a successful summoning, and they obey you. I see...
As a civilization develops, war is inevitable, and sacrifices will be made. Why wring your hands over progress?
My country was founded by one with a vision...and I want to see it through. That is all.
There is nothing that could make me happier than to observe the summoner at work, up close.
That's logical.
I'll consider it.
I wonder...
